page.title: 09RECREATION
page.content: People come to the{Piethorne valley}to take the{dog for a walk}or to come to {fish.}There are a lot of other{hobbies that poeple come up to do like climbing and walking.If you go up you {need a warden}to take care of you so you do not get into any trouble with {the farmer.}Poeple usually come up for a walk or to write about the hills the warden that comes around with you is called Mr Herron.In addition to these activities there are:_ {Hill walking,Nature trails,Guided {walks,Expeditions;Ornithology;Botany; {Lepidoptera;Geology;Archeology; Picnic {ing,Model aircraft,Environmental {studies,Field trips,Horse riding,Motor {cycle riding,Hang gliding,Holiday {homes,Caravan parks,Public houses,long {distance foot@aths,Army training, dog {kennels Horse stud farm, Restaurants, {inns.}S/G/10/7/85
